content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":150131,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私の髪の中からお菓子と魚肉ソーセージが！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There are sweets and fish sausage inside my hair!?\""},{"lineNumber":150132,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、それは、以前にランス様が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that is because previously Lord Rance"},{"lineNumber":150133,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シィルさんの頭の中に入れたおやつで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"put snacks inside Shiru-san's head...\""},{"lineNumber":150134,"originalJapaneseLine":"（お風呂のとき、","translatedEnglishLine":"(I wonder how they got in during the bath...)"},{"lineNumber":150135,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうやって紛れてたんだろう……）","translatedEnglishLine":"How did they sneak in...?)"},{"lineNumber":150136,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、なるほど……ランス様が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I see... Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":150137,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":150138,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":150139,"originalJapaneseLine":"揃ってシィルの手の上のおやつを眺める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Together, they gaze at the snacks on Shiru's hand."},{"lineNumber":150140,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Um,\""},{"lineNumber":150141,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes...\""},{"lineNumber":150142,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう少し……頑張りましょうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shall we... try a little harder...?\""},{"lineNumber":150143,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふっ、そうですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, yes...\""},{"lineNumber":150144,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人はどちらからともなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Without either of them saying it first,"},{"lineNumber":150145,"originalJapaneseLine":"帰ることに決めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the two decided to go back."},{"lineNumber":150146,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":150147,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":150148,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ということが」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That is what happened.\""},{"lineNumber":150149,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前ら頭おかしいんじゃないか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aren't you guys crazy?\""},{"lineNumber":150150,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そうでしょうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":150151,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But...\""},{"lineNumber":150152,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだかランス様に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I somehow felt encouraged by Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":150153,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元気づけられた気がしたんです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I felt like I was cheered up...\""},{"lineNumber":150154,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから……帰りたいなって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So... I wanted to go home...\""},{"lineNumber":150155,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":150156,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、今でもそのときシィルさんに貰った","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, even now the fish sausage I received from Shiru back then"},{"lineNumber":150157,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魚肉ソーセージは私の宝物に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"is my treasure...\""},{"lineNumber":150158,"originalJapaneseLine":"「捨てろ、んなもん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Throw that away.\""},{"lineNumber":150159,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh...\""},{"lineNumber":150160,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ、そろそろ時間だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, it's about time.\""},{"lineNumber":150161,"originalJapaneseLine":"「時間？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Time?\""},{"lineNumber":150162,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜の冷え切った空気がかすかに変わる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The cold night air subtly changes."},{"lineNumber":150163,"originalJapaneseLine":"風は澄んだものになり、","translatedEnglishLine":"The wind becomes clear,"},{"lineNumber":150164,"originalJapaneseLine":"木々の隙間からは、かすかではあるが、","translatedEnglishLine":"and through the gaps between the trees, faint though it is,"},{"lineNumber":150165,"originalJapaneseLine":"こもったような光が降り注ぎだしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"a muffled light begins to pour down."},{"lineNumber":150166,"originalJapaneseLine":"「朝、か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Morning, huh...\""},{"lineNumber":150167,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もうすぐ城に着く頃だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We should be arriving at the castle soon.\""},{"lineNumber":150168,"originalJapaneseLine":"「泣いても笑っても","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whether we cry or laugh,"},{"lineNumber":150169,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日がケッセルリンクとの決着になるだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"today will be the conclusion with Kesselrink.\""},{"lineNumber":150170,"originalJapaneseLine":"「気合い入れてけよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Get fired up.\""},{"lineNumber":150171,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がケッセルリンクの城に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others arrived at Kesselrink's castle."},{"lineNumber":150172,"originalJapaneseLine":"「時刻はギリギリ朝、昼少し前ってくらいか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The time is just barely morning, maybe just before noon."},{"lineNumber":150173,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バッチリだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Perfect timing.\""},{"lineNumber":150174,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふん、当然だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh, naturally.\""},{"lineNumber":150175,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それで、ここからどうする？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what do we do from here?\""},{"lineNumber":150176,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケッセルリンクは寝ているだろうが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kesselrink is probably asleep,"},{"lineNumber":150177,"originalJapaneseLine":"　問題はメイド達だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"but the problem is the maids.\""},{"lineNumber":150178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「奴らは不眠不休で戦える。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those guys can fight without sleep or rest."},{"lineNumber":150179,"originalJapaneseLine":"　既に俺達に気づいたと見ていいだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"We can assume they've already noticed us.\""},{"lineNumber":150180,"originalJapaneseLine":"「普通に戦うのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are we going to fight them outright?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私の髪の中からお菓子と魚肉ソーセージが！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are sweets and fish sausage inside my hair!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、それは、以前にランス様が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that is because previously Lord Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルさんの頭の中に入れたおやつで……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I wonder how they got in during the bath...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやって紛れてたんだろう……）
揃ってシィルの手の上のおやつを眺める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Together, they gaze at the snacks on Shiru's hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう少し……頑張りましょうか……」
二人はどちらからともなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without either of them saying it first,
the two decided to go back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前ら頭おかしいんじゃないか？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I somehow felt encouraged by Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元気づけられた気がしたんです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I felt like I was cheered up..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、今でもそのときシィルさんに貰った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, even now the fish sausage I received from Shiru back then

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魚肉ソーセージは私の宝物に……」
夜の冷え切った空気がかすかに変わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The cold night air subtly changes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 風は澄んだものになり、
木々の隙間からは、かすかではあるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and through the gaps between the trees, faint though it is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こもったような光が降り注ぎだしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a muffled light begins to pour down.
"We should be arriving at the castle soon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日がケッセルリンクとの決着になるだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: today will be the conclusion with Kesselrink."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がケッセルリンクの城に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others arrived at Kesselrink's castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時刻はギリギリ朝、昼少し前ってくらいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The time is just barely morning, maybe just before noon.
"So, what do we do from here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケッセルリンクは寝ているだろうが、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the problem is the maids."
"Those guys can fight without sleep or rest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に俺達に気づいたと見ていいだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can assume they've already noticed us."
"Are we going to fight them outright?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
